text.div:
Command Response

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
ER Command cannot be completed because of error conditionSee response parameters.added v2.4
OK Command completed successfullyadded v2.4
ST Command cannot be completed because of the status of the requested equipmentadded v2.4
TI Command cannot be completed within requested completion timeadded v2.4
UN Command cannot be completed for unknown reasonsadded v2.4

name: v2.0387
title: v2 Command response
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0387 ( Command response)

concept.display: Command cannot be completed because of error condition

designation.value: Commando kan niet worden uitgevoerd vanwege een foutconditie

concept.display: Command cannot be completed because of the status of the requested equipment

designation.value: Commando kan niet worden uitgevoerd vanwege de status van de gevraagde apparatuur

concept.display: Command cannot be completed within requested completion time

designation.value: Commando kan niet worden uitgevoerd binnen de gevraagde tijd voor voltooiing

concept.display: Command cannot be completed for unknown reasons

designation.value: Commando kan om onbekende redenen niet worden uitgevoerd
